subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Yankees are headed for postseason games, and when they next play at Yankee Stadium, their No. 1 cheerleader, owner George Steinbrenner, is expected to be there to offer inspiration.
snippet: The Yankees are headed for postseason games, and when they next play at Yankee Stadium, their No. 1 cheerleader, owner George Steinbrenner, is expected to be there to offer inspiration.
